REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f4094 reute u f BC-/GENCORP-<GY>-SAYS-RK 06-18 0054

TEXT.TITLE: GENCORP <GY> SAYS RKO UNIT SALE TERMINATED
TEXT.BODY: GenCorp said its agreement to sell its RKO Pictures subsidiary to a management group has been terminated because the group could not raise the necessary financing. The company said it will again seek buyers for the unit and its library of over 750 films. Reuter
